entry.title: 21st Century Scientific 1CP1FL 12V 100Ah Wheelchair Replacement Battery
entry.summary:
Vendor: BatteryClerk
Type: Wheelchair
Price: 311.99

Info
  • AJC® replacement compatible with 21st Century Scientific 1CP1FL Wheelchair Battery
  • Exact OEM replacement guaranteed to fit easily and precisely
  • Maintenance free AGM technology, no need to add acid or water ever
  • IMPORTANT: You MUST RE-USE: your existing cabling and hardware. These are replacement batteries only
  • NOTE: It is your responsibility to verify the batteries being ordered match the batteries in your unit prior to placing your order. We are not responsible for incorrect orders
  • UL Recognized Component
  • Backed by easy 30-day returns and 12-month warranty
Disclaimer: Our products are not affiliated with or authorized by 21st Century Scientific
Specs
  • AJC® Replacement Batteries
  • Part # AJC-D100S
  • Voltage: 12V (12 Volts)
  • Capacity: 100Ah
  • Terminals: NB
  • Chemistry: Sealed Lead Acid (AGM)
  • Length 13.07 in
  • Width 6.89 in
  • Height 8.7 in
  • Weight: 69 lbs
